title: A meta-learning based method for few-shot pneumonia identification using chest X-ray images
details: J Chen, T Liu, Y Cui, X Li, W Tong - Biomedical Signal Processing and Control, 2024
abstract: Pneumonia is a prevalent respiratory disease and conventional manual diagnosis methods are prone to misdiagnosis. Recently, deep learning based computer-aided diagnosis systems have played an important role in pneumonia identification …

title: Hierarchical SegNet with Channel and Context Attention for Accurate Lung Segmentation in Chest X-ray Images
details: MAL Khaniki, N Mahjourian, M Manthouri - arXiv preprint arXiv:2405.12318, 2024
abstract: Lung segmentation in chest X-ray images is a critical task in medical image analysis, enabling accurate diagnosis and treatment of various lung diseases. In this paper, we propose a novel approach for lung segmentation by integrating Hierarchical …
